system.description:
When you spend a scene by someone's side or @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.basic-moves.Item.gjr4zxZDb4fnI9bo]{Speak Softly} with them, you may gain a Bond with them immediately.

You can have an unlimited number of Bonds with anybody. People who you have Bonds with do not become Companions. You do not have enough pull with the fellowship to just recruit people. Those you have Bonds with will think well of you and will try not to harm you if they can help it, regardless of their feelings for the rest of the fellowship.

You can @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.special-moves.Item.yyAiJexNucQXPeQU]{Command Lore} about anyone you have any Bonds with, except for your Bonds with other players. You can @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.special-moves.Item.yyAiJexNucQXPeQU]{Command Lore} about Companions, friends, and minions of the Overlord who you have Bonds with, but you cannot @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.special-moves.Item.yyAiJexNucQXPeQU]{Command Lore} about the other heroes of the fellowship or about the Overlord.

This move cannot be Shared.
